page.title: 03ROADS,RAILWAYS AND CANAL.
page.content: Wilmcote{Railway}station has 2 lines and 2 platforms,but Stratford station has 3 platforms.The trains come from Leamington and Birmingham,and the first train leaves Stratford at 6.20am and the last at 6.35pm.From Monday to Saturday, 15 trains run daily between Stratford and Wilmcote and the journey takes 5 minutes. The A34 and A422 run through the area. There are 7.5km of "A roads" and 7.25km of minor{roads.}In 1986 a { {bypass}will be built to join the A34 & A422. From a{survey}of 120 houses in Bishopton{--% vehicle owners:_}Car 45, Van 2,Bicycle 42,Motorbike 4,Camper 1. The Stratford on Avon {canal }has 10 locks and 2 lock houses,a weir,and 2 {bridges.}The canal crosses under the railway once near Stratford and has a {towing path}on the East side.
